content: I have seen similar programs in China before, and the overall is good.

It's worth seeing! The stage effect is very good, the actors are very attentive, and the whole song and dance show is very good. And I appreciate the close-knit style of Korean actors. The main actors will invite the audience to take a photo at the entrance before the opening, and after the end, all the actors and the audience will take a photo one by one. But the booking link is more worried. I have arrived in Korea. I was still calling the international long-distance booking confirmation the day before the movie.

All kinds of shows are very good, this is a random new product, marriage show, let us all experience the feeling of marriage is really tired, there are so many things to do, VIP seat you may be pulled up to a section, haha, super funny, very good performance
It was arranged that VIP seat ～ and finally was invited to dance with the actors. ～ It ended my trip to Seoul with a complete end.

Very good show, the actors are very hardworking and very happy to watch. I recommend everyone. If you have more time in Seoul, you can go to the wedding show and the random fight show. If you only have enough time to watch one, I personally recommend the random fight show.

The real story - "foreigners laughed at the zodiac, the Chinese people asked people to think deeply. Once, a group of Chinese people participated in the reception of a visiting group composed of European aristocrats. Most of them have kinship with the Royal family. They are very learned and cultured. They treat people politely, but there is a kind of arrogance behind their accomplishment. On the last day of dinner, they may have drunk too much, and the nobility's words and manners become more straightforward. During the dinner, a German aristocrat stood up and said, * how do you Chinese belong to pigs, dogs, rats? Unlike us, Taurus, Leo, Andromeda... I don't know what your ancestors thought. Everyone laughed and knocked glasses together, and the former elegance was completely gone. It's reasonable to say that people are scolding your ancestors. If you can't think of a counterattack, you can at least lift the table. However, all the Chinese present are silent, and they may not have responded. At this time, a Chinese man stood up and said in a calm tone - "Yes, the Chinese ancestors were very real. Our twelve zodiac signs are two opposite, six reincarnations, reflecting our ancestors'expectations and requirements for us. " At this time, the scene atmosphere slowly quieted down, but the nobles face is still a look of indifference. The Chinese say that the first group is mice and cattle. Rats represent intelligence, cows represent diligence. Intelligence and diligence must be closely combined. If you are intelligent and not diligent, you will become smart; but if you are diligent and do not use your mind, you will become foolish. The two must be combined. This is the expectation and requirement of our ancestors to our first group, and also the most important group. " The second group was tigers and rabbits. Tiger stands for bravery, rabbit for caution. Courage and prudence must be tightly combined in order to be bold and careful. If bravery leaves prudence, it becomes recklessness, but without bravery, it becomes timidity. This group is also very important, so." Chinese people look at these nobles, add a sentence - "When we show caution, do not think that the Chinese people do not have a brave side. " Watching everyone sink into meditation, the Chinese continue to say - "The third group is dragon and snake, dragon stands for fierce, snake stands for flexibility. The so-called rigid is easy to break, too rigid is easy to break, but if only the soft side is easy to lose their own ideas, so, the combination of rigidity and softness is our ancestor's precept. " Next comes the horse and the sheep. The horse represents courage and the sheep represents harmony. If a person only cares about his own goals, regardless of the surrounding environment, will inevitably continue to bump around, and ultimately may not be able to achieve the goal. However, a person who patronizes and smoothly, he may not even have direction. Therefore, the spirit of advancing bravely must be closely combined with harmony and obedience, which is the fourth group of ancestors to us.
Tickets are free, there are many trees, and the air is really fresh. There are some people walking, very quiet.
